source.48e73a47:
fig, ax = plt.subplots(30, 10, figsize=(12, 30), dpi=200)

img_lst = glob.glob('/kaggle/input/blizzard-starcraft-map-dataset/*.jpg')

for i in range(30):
    for j in range(10):
        if len(img_lst) > i*10 + j : 
            img = Image.open(img_lst[i*10+j])
            ax[i][j].imshow(img)
        ax[i][j].axis('off')

plt.tight_layout()
plt.subplots_adjust(hspace=0.03, wspace=0.03)
plt.show()
source.fadb495b:
## Crawling code 

``` python 
import requests
import string
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
from PIL import Image
from io import BytesIO
import os

img_url = list() 

for alp in string.ascii_uppercase:
    html_doc = requests.get(
        f"https://starcraft.fandom.com/wiki/Category:StarCraft_map_images?from={alp}")

    soup = BeautifulSoup(html_doc.text, 'html.parser')
    div_lst = soup.find_all('div', 'category-page__member-left')

    for div in div_lst:
        img = div.find('img')
        if img:
            src = img.get('data-src')
            if 'gif' not in src:
                img_url.append(src)


def image_save(url, dir, name):
    r = requests.get(url)
    img = Image.open(BytesIO(r.content))
    img.save(f'{dir}/{name}')


os.mkdir(starcraft_map_image)
for url in img_url:
    image_save(url, 'starcraft_map_image', url.split('/')[-3])

```
